Invocation Name: morocco facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Morocco has been ruled by the Romans and Arab nations throughout history. Know more such interesting facts with this skill.

Morocco sits in the North of the African continent. Its position means that is has close links with Europe, as it faces the Mediterranean Sea looking onto Spain. For various lengths of time in history Morocco has been taken over by many countries and rulers. The most recent being France, which meant it was part of the French Empire.

Source: https://www.thefactsite.com/morocco-facts/
